E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 7/25/1973
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 7/29/1973
Subject: Progress of Claudell Washington
Dear Sir,
Claudell Washington is hitting the ball well at AA Pittsfield Rangers!
He has an AVG of .309, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
